## PackagesAPI.listStacks() method

Grab a list of installed Influx packages. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/ListStacks](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/ListStacks)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
listStacks(request: ListStacksRequest, requestOptions?: RequestOptions): Promise<{
        stacks?: Stack[];
    }>;
```

|  requestOptions | [RequestOptions](./influxdb-client-apis.requestoptions.md) | optional transport options |
